title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 72.12 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 72.12 - Severability

State Regulations

Any provision of this Part or its application to any person
or circumstance found to be invalid shall be ineffective to the extent of such
invalidation without affecting the remainder of this Part or the application of
those provisions to persons or circumstances other than those to which it is
held invalid. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
72.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
